name: Lionel The Guardian
description:
You play as Lionel, a giant that was banished from his tribe and adopted by a group of gnomes. He needs to help them by becoming the guardian of their village. However, it's necessary to go through a series of challenges.

Current features:

  • Funny storyline.
  • Great 2D graphics with fluid animations.
  • Amazing songs.
  • Collect treasures to earn points and increase your score.
  • Tutorial and four missions available.
  • Simple 2D mechanics. Walk and shoot!
  • Explore a new fantasy world.

Future features:

  • 6 missions. Test your ability against monsters, traps, puzzles and bosses.

System Requirements:

OS: Tested with Windows 10, macOS Sierra 10.12.6, Ubuntu 16.04 and Manjaro Linux (probably no problems with a modern Linux distribution), Android device .

Memory: 1 GB RAM.

Graphics:  OpenGL ES 2.0.

Storage: At the time, 100 MB.
